title: Plugging in $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: $$(3,1)$$ is not a solution because both equations are not true when $$x=3$$ and $$y=1$$ are plugged in.\n##figure2.gif##
speech: times, parentheses 3 comma 1,   is not a solution because both equations are not true when  x is equal to 3  and  y, is equal to 1  are plugged in.\n##figure2.gif##
